org.apache.karaf.profile

Interface Profile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProfileConstants

    public interface Profile
extends ProfileConstants
    A profile is a container for configuration that can be applied to Karaf distribution.

    Profiles may inherit from other (single or multiple) profiles. An overlay profile is single profile with all the configurations, attributes and files from parent profiles, while configurations, attributes and files from child profile overwrites corresponding data from parent profiles.

    Configuration include:

    • Attributes
    • ConfigAdmin configurations (PIDs) to put into ${karaf.etc} directory
    • Other resources to put into ${karaf.etc} directory

    Attributes are properties in special file profile.cfg (profile PID) and may specify:

    • OSGi bundles to install (prefix: bundle.)
    • Karaf features to install (prefix: feature.)
    • Feature XML repositories to use to resolve bundles and features (prefix: repository.)
    • Identifiers of parent profiles (property name: attribute.parents)
    • Indication of abstract profile (property name: abstract)
    • Indication of hidden profile (property name: hidden)
    • Different attributes (prefix: attribute.)
    • Properties to be added to etc/config.properties (prefix: config.)
    • Properties to be added to etc/system.properties (prefix: system.)
    • Additional libraries to be added to lib (prefix: library.)
    • Additional libraries to be added to lib/boot (prefix: boot.)
    • Additional libraries to be added to lib/endorsed (prefix: endorsed.)
    • Additional libraries to be added to lib/ext (prefix: ext.)
    • Bundle override definitions to be added to etc/overrides.properties (prefix: override.)
    • Optional resources to be used during resolution (prefix: optional.)
Shall be called with ProfileServiceImpl, ProfileService.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.karaf.profile.ProfileConstants

        ABSTRACT, ATTRIBUTE_PREFIX, BLACKLISTED_BUNDLE_PREFIX, BLACKLISTED_FEATURE_PREFIX, BLACKLISTED_PREFIX, BLACKLISTED_REPOSITORY_PREFIX, BOOT_PREFIX, BUNDLE_PREFIX, CONFIG_PREFIX, DELETED, DESCRIPTION, ENDORSED_PREFIX, EXT_PREFIX, FEATURE_PREFIX, HIDDEN, INTERNAL_PID, LIB_PREFIX, OPTIONAL_PREFIX, OVERLAY, OVERRIDE_PREFIX, PARENTS, PROPERTIES_SUFFIX, REPOSITORY_PREFIX, SYSTEM_PREFIX

      • getConfiguration

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getConfiguration(java.lang.String pid)
        Get the configuration properties for the given PID.
        Parameters:
        pid - The configuration PID to look for.
        Returns:
        An empty map if the there is no configuration for the given pid.

      • isOverlay

        boolean isOverlay()
        Indicate if this profile is an overlay or not. An overlay profile includes configurations and attributes of parent profiles, while descendant profiles always have priority over parent profiles.
        Returns:
        True if the profile is an overlay, false else.

      • isAbstract

        boolean isAbstract()
        Return true if this profile is Abstract. Abstract profiles should not be provisioned by default, they are intended to be inherited.
        Returns:
        True if the profile is abstract, false else.

      • isHidden

        boolean isHidden()
        Return true if this profile is hidden. Hidden profiles are not listed by default.
        Returns:
        True if the profile is hidden, false else.
